user_request: install app "Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit"
screen_desc: The screenshot shows an Android home screen with a pink gradient wallpaper. It has app icons arranged in a grid, including Google Play, LinkedIn, DuckDuckGo, NewsBreak, Expedia, Speedtest, eBay, Truecaller, ColorNote, Adobe Acrobat, and Indeed Jobs. Below the grid, there are two primary app icons for messaging and Chrome browser. A Google search bar with a voice assistant shortcut is at the bottom. The status bar at the top displays the time (9:30), battery, and network icons.

think_action.Thought: To install the 'Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit' app, I need to open the Google Play Store first. The Google Play Store app is visible on the current screen, represented by its icon. The next step is to tap the Google Play icon to launch the app.
Future Action Plan: Tap on the Google Play icon to open the Play Store.
Search for 'Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit' within the Play Store.
Find the app and tap on the 'Install' button.
Wait for the app to download and install.
think_action.Next Single Step Action: Tap on the Google Play icon.
